attributes.agent_name: Motus Ford Paarden Eiland Used Cars
attributes.description:
2022 FORD ECOSPORT 1.0 ECOBOOST TREND A/T
This quality used vehicle is at Motus Ford Paarden Eiland, just next to the N1 in Cape Town. We deliver nationwide and will arrange your finance and insurance with ease. We have a full range pre-owned Ford and other popular brands of used vehicles. We would like to give you the best deal on a used car or low mileage demo vehicle.
We also offer value added products such as:
Mechanical Breakdown Warranty
Maintenance and Service Plans
Crystal Fusion Windshield Protection / Reduces Night Glare
Restore it Care – Bodyline and Interior Maintenance
Matrix – Beame Recovery
Smash & Grab Window Protection

attributes.description:
If you are looking for a quality Pre-Owned Vehicles then look no further.  Our vehicles go through a 108 -point quality check to ensure that you are getting value for your money.  
Book a test drive today to experience this vehicle.  Delivery can be arranged nationwide. Price excludes admin and delivery fee. Finance can be arranged on premises and trade- ins are welcome. We at Motus Mazda Germiston strive for perfection, so that you as the customer can make the most of each moment and opportunity while shopping for the perfect vehicle to suit your needs so please do take a stroll on our showroom floor. We give you peace of mind knowing that every vehicle is subject to a stringent Check List.  
You are welcome to speak to one of our Finance consultants for a tailored financial package to suite your needs or one of our Sales Executives, to help with all your vehicle requirements..

We will tailor make a finance package that will suit your pocket. Kia Pinetown can offer extended warranties and service plans on all vehicles. attributes.title: 2021 Kia Picanto 1.0 Start

attributes.description:
At Kia Alberton, we pride ourselves on delivering high quality pre-owned vehicles. All our vehicles undergo a thorough 125-point quality check, roadworthy and valet.  

The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. When buying a vehicle from us, you join the Kia Alberton Family and family look after each other. We will structure a package that will not only suit your needs but your pocket too.   

Call now and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you to our showroom to view and test drive the vehicle. 

Finance can be arranged through all major financial institutions, nationwide delivery available and all trade-ins accepted subject to view. Price excludes on the road fees.

attributes.description: Come in today and test drive this car, IT IS FOR YOU! Don’t delay we will evaluate your existing vehicle for FREE. We will not short change you. Visit our website to see our full range of stock. A 1% of the value of the vehicle non refundable deposit, secures the vehicle for two days. If that deposit lapses, You would be required to put another nonrefundable deposit to secure it further. Please be aware of scams with fraudsters using other advertiser’s photos. DO NOT pay any deposits unless you deal and pay deposits directly into Primo Executive Cars bank account!
